title: Name the only champion in this game
body:
That completely changes the game and everyones playstyle/picks the moment he sneaks past pick/ban phase. 
and makes the players skill irrelevent.
Here's a hint, hes an edgy cuck with long black hair

replies.body:
Hey there, how can I report that an account was leveled by a bot?


{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

Imagine being so bitter that yoru trash at the game that you report someones acc in another region, oof

Hey there, where can i report someone for being a shitty human being
How many times you played yasuo outside of bot games? My guess is less than 5.

> [{quoted}](name=Saezio,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=nElUtMmn,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2019-07-01T14:11:48.892+0000)
>
> How many times you played yasuo outside of bot games? My guess is less than 5.

Are you implying yasuo is hard?

eve, twitch, yas, tryndaderp, nasus, renekton, zoe, kata, vlad, yuumi, kalista, illaoi, ivern, kench, kog/lulu (as a pair)

think that's all of them.
you don't get to play regular league with these on the map.
He's an edgy cuck with long black hair, you say... {{champion:141}} {{champion:236}} {{champion:11}} {{champion:517}} {{champion:5}}?

Really? I've never found him to change picks or playstyles much. Maybe people are a bit more cautious with abilities if they're smart, but that should be happening with anyone who has any spellshield variant.
